alert.note: Alert for Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 10:14AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kenedy and eastern Brooks Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 1013 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Sarita, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sarita and Kenedy County Sheriffs Office. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
